title.narrative: Southeast Gobi Urban and Border Town Development Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to maximize benefits from development of mining and border trade activities in the region.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Urban governance improved and access to sustainable infrastructure and services expanded in urban places in Southeast Gobi and other aimags.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
New water, sewerage, SWM, and heating use in planned (non-ger) areas increased to 95% in four soums, and to 100% in two aimag centers

description.narrative: Urban governance improved and access to sustainable infrastructure and services expanded in urban places in Southeast Gobi and other aimags.

title.narrative: 20% reduction in average time women spend on accessing drinking water by September 2015

description.narrative: Urban governance improved and access to sustainable infrastructure and services expanded in urban places in Southeast Gobi and other aimags.

title.narrative: Ger area population with access to water kiosks within 300 meters of dwelling increased

description.narrative: Urban governance improved and access to sustainable infrastructure and services expanded in urban places in Southeast Gobi and other aimags.

title.narrative: Water, sewerage, SWM, and heating coverage in planned (non-ger) areas increased from 0% to 95% in soums, and from 95% to 100% in aimag centers
